name: coffee-feedback-workspace
description: Voice-enabled coffee tasting feedback collection system - Monorepo

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start:prod: cd backend && venv\Scripts\activate && gunicorn main:app --workers 4 --worker-class uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker

author: ABCD Coffee Testing
